评论详情: I don't dislike these enough to return them but also wouldn't purchase them again. The fabric is thinner than I expected for $32 leggings (especially when comparable products on Amazon were around $20). I live in Southern California, so not a cold climate, but my legs were freezing in 65-degree weather. These also just feel like very high-waisted leggings as opposed to maternity leggings, which is fine I guess. The belly part of the leggings are no different than the rest of the leggings.
They're a bit large but I'm 20 weeks so I expect to grow into them. They're stretchy enough that I might have sized down though. We'll see
These leggings are so incredibly comfortable! They are the only thing I want to wear in my third trimester. I will be buying them in several different colors.

Im 5'2 and these are a bit long. I'll pull them up and of course they slide back down during workouts and just walking. There's also a slight camel toe because there's a front seam, they're black so you can hardly notice though. Ido like the soft stretchy workout material of them. These are mid and I wouldn't buy them again, keeping because I'm only pregnant for a short while and they do the job enough, just not a huge fan of wearing them.

评论用户: Not the best quality, I swear they attract pet hair, they never smell fresh even right out of the wash
评论详情: the fit is great, but after wearing them for a month the waist band has come unsewn completely. I am so sad, 2 months to go in the pregnancy and need to order more due to them coming unsewn.

Probably my favorite leggings I have found for my 3rd pregnancy. They are smooth like butter, hug to my body nicely, comfortable over the belly, don’t slide down or stretch out after wearing, not see-through, and they stretch with the swelling in your legs so they always fit and are never too tight. I have cotton leggings that I can’t wear due to my increase of swelling in my legs, so these have been my number 1 go too as they don’t suffocate my ankles.  Highly suggest them. I promise you will love them! Worth every penny.

These are so insanely comfortable and stretchy. They fit me great in pregnancy. But the pilling where my legs rub together is very bad. I use a de-piller machine constantly on these and it just keeps pilling. Also just slightly see through with bright lighting. I’m 5’7” and 140lbs prepregnancy, now 165ish at 33 weeks pregnant and a small fit me well.

评论概述: Amazing and super comfortable maternity leggings!
评论详情: I am 20 weeks pregnant and was in the thought process of getting larger lululemon leggings… i am SO glad i found these!! SUPER comparible to lulu’s- if not almost identical. I wore it working out and it stayed up and was comfortable the entire time. Not to mention the price! Super worth it!

The leggings are so soft! I got these after my aligns didnt fit anymore so I lived in these the last 3 months of my pregnancy. Whatever size you are normally pre-pregnancy order that size. You'll want these!!

I purchased the maternity shirt in pink peony and was patiently waiting for the leggings in the same color to come back in stock. I purchased them when they did but when they arrived they weren’t the same shade of pink. The tag says “vita pink”, disappointing bc I wanted to wear them as a set. Still a cute bubblegum pink. The photo is the comparison between the “pink peony” shade and “vita pink”. I’ve only washed the shirt once so it’s not faded.

There’s absolutely no compression at all. I wish I had sized down (I bought my true size L). These slide down quite a bit and I keep yanking them up. The middle seam is also unflattering. I wore them for a day and wish I could return them.

I'm only 13 weeks so not in need yet of maternity leggings but these had great reviews and were on sale so I grabbed a pair. These are FANTASTIC! So comfortable for an everyday/lounge legging while pregnant - I haven't worked out with them but they are not compressive at all so probably only good for walking. They are light and buttery soft and fit well - I'd say if anything they run a little big but not to the point that you need to size down. Going to grab another pair or two!

评论概述: Not as good as the reviews say
评论详情: Did a lot of comparing between maternity leggings to try to find a good pair and ended up choosing these based on the reviews. I have already worn and washed them or else I would return. They are super thin, don’t hide panty lines, and I can tell they’ll start to pill quickly.
These are literally the best maternity leggings ever. So incredibly soft. Perfect fit. Not tight on the bump. I need 100 pairs of these!!!

评论概述: Excellent legging, way better than more expensive ones from other maternity-specific brands
评论详情: These are nice, lightweight, buttery soft maternity leggings.  Very similar in feel to the align leggings from lululemon.  Fits really well other the bump.  I'm about 32 weeks pregnant, 5'6" hovering around 170 lbs and the medium fits great.  Pre-pregnancy weight was around 140-145 and my usual size was medium.  I believe there is still plenty of room in these to continue to stretch through the end of the pregnancy.  Other leggings I've tried are too constricting at the top of the belly and at the ankles and are not stretchy enough and cut in causing discomfort.  These leggings do not have that problem.  They are comfortable to wear all day long, and there are no seams that cut into the legs.  I wish I would have bought these earlier in the pregnancy and before I purchased two other pairs from other maternity-specific brands.  Only note is they are not very warm if you are looking for something to wear out in the winter.  However, they are amazing and breathable when you get to someone who keeps their house at 74 degrees...  Highly recommend -- will likely by another pair.
They are amazing!!! I just have to exchange for a smaller size!!!! So soft it’s hard to order sizes pregnant!

The best maternity leggings period!! I’m eight months pregnant now and these leggings are still my absolute favorite. Bought my pre-pregnancy size small (I’m 5ft 2in and 130ish lbs pre-pregnancy) and they still work for me at 150ish lbs.
They are like butter

评论用户: Super comfortable, love how the fur is sewn into each individual part of shoe , just bought it in black
评论详情: So comfortable they stay put just absolutely love these . I’m 5’6 165lbs size medium . I actually just bought second pair .
These fit snug but not too snug. At 31 weeks, they fully cover my bump. I really wish these came with pockets!!

Quality doesn't deem to be the same across the board. I bought another pair because the first were so comfortable. Got the same size, but one pair fits and stays up, the other pair doesn't stay up and constantly fall down and are loose at the ankle almost like they were stretched out or don't have elasticity.
Love these! These are my go to for workouts. I’m not doing any deep squatting to testify squat proof but great for cardio/low weighs in 2nd trimester

评论概述: Favorite brand for workout gear on Amazon!
评论详情: I had leggings from this brand, prior to being pregnant and lived in these while pregnant! They really are like butter! Pre-pregnancy I was a size 10 and got these in a medium, they lasted me up until my baby was born and have still been wearing them 5 weeks after birth! Definitely recommend!

This is the best pair of maternity leggings I’ve tried! I’ve ordered a few different ones, all in my regular size (small), and at only 21 weeks pregnant (my bump is still fairly small)- They already feel tight/constricting on my belly. These leggings are so stretchy, soft, and comfortable, I know that they will easily fit me throughout my entire pregnancy. I’m ordering another pair!
Love the way they fit !

Honestly it's so frustrating because these are perfect when you're pregnant. They don't fall down but aren't too tight and are so soft but this pilling at the seams started after one wear. My friend got them for me as a gift and for nearly 40$ you'd think they would hold up better. I feel bad she wasted money on something I won't wear out.

评论概述: The only pregnancy legging you need
评论详情: I wanted to buy the least amount of clothing during pregnancy and these leggings were all that I needed.. Fit throughout the entire pregnancy with flexibility and comfort. The waistband was not restrictive or elastic  - no pressure at all. Buy them
These were all I wore the last 10 weeks of my pregnancy. So comfy and true to your pre-pregnancy size

These are buttery soft! I was pleasantly surprised by these. They fit really well too. Some maternity pants feel so odd and these are very comfortable. Overall, very impressed and will be buying more.

评论概述: Comfortable, but doesn’t keep me warm.
评论详情: I ordered as usual size before pregnant and it fits well even over the bump where it’s most comfortable. But, the only downside is it didn’t keep me warm.

评论概述: Faux Leather Came Off After Two Wears
评论详情: I purchased the Faux Leather Black leggings for occasions where I go out. Overall, I love the high rise and how it completely covers my bump! It’s not very thick or compressive material but there is plenty of room for my bump to grow. When I first received the leggings I loved the faux leather look but after just 2 washes it had completely come off and now they just look like regular black leggings. I will still wear them but am disappointed that for $32 they no longer look like what I purchased and cannot be used as what I had intended them for.

I NEVER write reviews and I had to for these leggings! They are buttery soft, they don't get lint stuck in them like the MomCozy maternity leggings. They are super smooth and easy to put on. I am 34 weeks pregnant, 5'5" and 225 lbs right now  and got an XL. They are NOT see through and stay up great. I could not love them more. I will be ordering another pair

评论概述: Feel great but have to pull them up constantly
评论详情: I might need to size down next time. I ordered my usual size (L) but am constantly pulling them up. The  material is great and I want to love them. Might try a M next time.

评论概述: MY RIDE OR DIE PREGNANCY LEGGINGS
评论详情: I am an avid lululemon girl when not pregnant.  I ordered a medium initially (usually wear a 6 in lulu), & they just weren’t as compressive (not that I want the belly squeezed!) as I wanted them to be, ended up getting an XXS and they are great.  I’m 5’3” and they are maybe an inch longer than I want, but I just roll the very end up an inch, & they are perfect. Squat proof. Comfortable.  I’ve had these for a few months now, and have noticed some pilling on the inner thigh portion.  The color selection is awesome.
Love the fabric and comfort of these. Perfect for my growing belly
I love these!!!! They fit perfect. On days I wear them I am so comfortable.
These leggings are perfect for expecting mamas
Was pregnant two times and bought them. They are so comfy and fit nicely. 180 5”4
These legit feel like butter. They are so soft. They do tend to shrink in length.
When I was pregnant I literally lived in these leggings. They are super soft and the good kind of stretchy. I wanna get pregnant again just so I can wear these again.
I bought these for my daughter for Christmas based on positive reviews.  My daughter loves them.  Great fit and room to grow.  As advertised, they are buttery soft and don't slide down.
Best maternity leggings ever. Not see through, true to size and they wash so nice. I’m still wearing them 2 weeks post partum because they are so comfortable.

I bought these when I started to worry about stretching out my expensive non-maternity leggings. They are super smooth and soft. When I was about 20 weeks along I could have easily sized down because they are so stretchy, but I was glad I went true to size once I was further in my pregnancy. I ended up with like 8 different colors of these. They aren’t see through and were well priced for the quality.

I’m 33 weeks pregnant and ordered a medium, they are a little bit pricey but very comfortable leggings. I probably could’ve sized down to a small but I didn’t want to risk not having room to grow. The only thing I found to be a little off putting was the waistband going up to under my boobs but then again I’m pretty short so others may not experience that.

评论概述: Literally through out all my other leggings!!
评论详情: These are amazing and great quality! Get the option with pockets comes in handy!!
This is definitely my wife's favorite leggings during her pregnancy. She had three different colors. Size and color held up pretty good.

The most comfortable leggings I’ve ever worn but definitely size down. Maybe even 2 sizes. I’m typically a medium and I bought a small. I should have gotten an XS. I’m 5 foot 145 pounds and 6 months pregnant for reference.

These are the absolute best maternity leggings ever! The material is so soft, and they are not see through. At 165 lbs, 25 weeks pregnant I could have gotten away with a Medium, but ordered a Large instead. Would highly recommend buying these.
These leggings are so soft and stretchy (in the way our bellies need it). I love spending all day in them :) I’ll probably buy many more!
My daughter in law loved these! Very soft and comfy.  She got the small and she’s in her 7th month of pregnancy and is 4’11”.

Similar to Lulu in the sense that they are buttery soft, but they definitely are more thin. Sizing is important & I felt like it was hard for me to find comparisons for my body in the reviews so leaving my review here! I was 114 lbs (5’5”) before pregnancy and now I’m 130 lbs at 14 weeks and 4 days. I am showing with a small bump. The XS was perfect for me. I still feel like I have enough room in the belly band to grow. It’s not super compressive, but it still feels secure.
Butter soft! They do tend to slide down though. If that could be fixed they would be perfect. However, I know they are made to not be tight on the belly which probably would prevent sliding.
These are hands down the best maternity leggings. Tried several different brands and these ones specifically don’t fall down and have the softest material

Loved these maternity faux leather leggings. I ended up using to make a DIY costume for a concert but was very impressed by the material and fit. Was tempted to buy more just for daily use. This style is very comfy and also fashionable, could where out and about, to dinner with a cute top or for workouts.

Me regaló este legging una amiga que terminó su embarazo, y me gustó tanto que tuve que buscarlo en Amazon. Me pedí dos talla S, usualmente soy M pero vienen un poco amplios así que el S fue muy buena opción.  Estan super cómodos, suavecitos y perfectos para cualquier ocasión

评论概述: The best leggings ever! so soft and breathable
评论详情: I will be buying multiple pairs because i wear these way too much lol
Great quality, and also very comfortable loved them and already ordered 2 more pairs
These leggings are buttery soft. They feel perfect!

If you’re pregnant, and you like to wear leggings, buy these now! I’ve already purchased a second pair. They will certainly be a staple throughout my pregnancy. I imagine you could still wear them beyond pregnancy; just roll the extensive waist band. I’m impressed by these. Super soft and comfy. They honestly kind of remind me of Lululemon leggings for a fraction of the price, AND they’re perfect for a growing belly. Best piece of maternity clothing I’ve bought so far.

I bought the CRZ super high waisted leggings and have been using them since being 12 weeks pregnant. I decided to try out the actual maternity ones and were disappointed at the fabric. The non-maternity leggings in black were a good thick material.  I was disappointed that the maternity leggings in black felt thinner and were see through. I returned and would not order again.

评论概述: love the material but the fit is off
评论详情: I love the regular leggings but the Smalls were a bit snug so I sized up to the Mediums for maternity and that was a mistake. The ankles are huge!! I would return them for Smalls if it wasn’t such a hassle. So I suggest size down

These are very soft, stretchy material. I’m 30 weeks pregnant now and there’s plenty of stretch for my growing belly. I’m 5’1” and these are slightly long on me, but not too long to where they bunch up at the ankles. Stick with your pre-pregnancy size. Good quality for the price! Highly recommend!
These are super soft but I feel run big and not true to size. I got a small which is very loose at the bottom of the legs near the ankles
Love these! Perfect for a growing belly and feels exactly like lululemon

These leggings fit really well, are buttery soft, AND haven’t punctured or torn at all despite my cat’s constant bids for pets and food (he likes to claw at my legs to get attention while I’m sitting at our high top table). Highly recommend them. Pockets are great, color is nice. I got them in a few colors.

I am a sucker for lululemon leggings. While pregnant my lululemon didn’t fit so unordered these and LOVED them! I wore them every week. They are so comfy and soft and flattering. They feel so butter and cozy over the bump!
Not see through, very comfy, great quality for $$$

Bought 2 pairs for my daughter who is expecting. Black and hot pink. Both fit the same. She loves them. Very comfortable and has a lot of stretch. Good material. Can dress up or down. Will be good after baby as well. Bought an XL - she is normally a L but wanted extra room for belly. Want to try the flare ones next.

评论概述: Poor quality; fell apart after first use
评论详情: Loved these at first, so soft and comfy. However after the first wear I noticed the entire seam was coming apart. Very very disappointing quality....

Leggings are buttery soft and similar to LuLu Lemon brand. These leggings have a lot of stretch in the belly area and not see through! Definitely buying a few more throughout my pregnancy. I’m typically a small/ medium and bought a medium, perfect size.

I really love these leggings! The fit true to size, have lots of stretch, and the material over the belly does not roll or fall down like many other brands. Material is very soft. My only complaint is the crotch is a bit loose and these aren't as thick as many yoga/workout leggings. I do prefer ones that are a bit thicker with more spandex type material for a bit more compression, but the comfort of these definitely outweighs that complaint.

I just ordered it last night and it was delivered by the time I woke up! For the price I paid, I really wasn’t expecting much but oh my! These are amazing! I ordered my pre pregnancy size which was small and it fit great! Plus there is plenty of room for growth since I’m 27 weeks pregnant and still have some time to go! I will be ordering in bunch of other colors.

These are very comfortable. They are also very thin, comparable to the align from lulu. If you need warmth, these are not for you. I have these in non-maternity as well and I like them. Would buy again!
If you are pregnant get these!! They are so comfy and a great price!
I lived in these during my pregnancy.  They are soft and stretchy.  Not much compression or support if that is what you are looking for
I'm 6 months pregnant and I've tried 5+ different maternity leggings and none are as soft and comfy as these. Absolutely no tightness or discomfort in them. Very pleased wth them!!!

I love these leggings! They are so soft and the seams are thin so it doesn’t squeeze your belly as it grows. I’ve lived in these throughout my pregnancy and highly recommended to any expecting mommas.
Runs large vs the standard legging of theirs. Its super stretchy!! They were still good
I won’t wear anything but these leggings while pregnant so comfortable I love the fabric.
Material is very buttery and soft. One less star because of no pockets... :/

On my 3rd pregnancy and these are the most comfortable, most flattering maternity leggings. They are way higher quality than targets maternity section, buttery soft. The material doesn’t loosen and sag. They smooth out all the bumps and humps on my butt and thighs. I can’t say enough good things about these. They aren’t cotton either like a lot of brands maternity leggings. They are true yoga material but not suffocating like regular yoga pants can be when you’re pregnant. I asked for these for Christmas and I am going to be buying at least 2 more pairs because I’ll be living in these through my 2nd and beginning of 3rd trimester through all of winter. For reference, I’m 5’2, and 160 lbs but most of the weight is in my chest. I wear a M and they are perfect.

If I couldve Bought 8 of these during my pregnancy I would Have because I wanted to wear them everyday. The leggings are soft, stretchy quality that is like buttery smooth. Definitely worth the price, just wish I could Have bought more! I gave Them to my sister who is currently pregnant, and will probably buy more if I ever Get pregnant again. Color is a little lighter than black, I bought a small and they fit all through my second and third trimester and were not see through whatsoever.

These leggings are exactly what I’ve been looking for. I almost didn’t get them bc they’re on the expensive end of what I’d prefer to spend, but they fit perfectly and the material is so soft and thick enough not to be see-through. They don’t have pockets so they could easily be dressed up or down. I haven’t washed them yet but they seem to be made pretty well! I would be surprised if they were to end up coming apart like others I’ve seen on here. Overall very happy with them and might even buy another pair!

These leggings are so comfortable. I wore them all throughout my pregnancy & never once did they pile or pulled. However, they do not provide any support for the belly. The belly area is stretchy & comfortable. It would have been better if it was a little tighter in my personal preference. They are not see through. They can be styled with anything! The sizing is accurate. I was about 165-170 pre-pregnancy. I ordered a large. I probably could have sized down to a medium & maybe they might have been more compressive on the belly area.

The leggings are soft and they are good leggings. I would say they run slightly big. I’m a true medium and they fall down, but I’m also still in the 2nd trimester. However I will say that they are NOT a Lululemon dupe. Lululemon is much higher quality, thicker, and more flattering and they hold you in more. Overall a good and decent priced legging but I would pay more for better quality

These leggings are so comfortable. I got them in 5 colors. They are so light, it doesn’t even feel like you’re wearing pants. Highly recommend if your lulu lemon, Fabletics, etc. are starting to feel tight around your bump. I’m typically 125 lbs and have gained 25 lbs and the small works great.

I have been desperately needing leggings that feel soft and stretchy to accommodate my growing belly. These are it! I’m 5’6” about 177 lbs and 16 weeks pregnant with my second. I’m already outgrowing everything I wear. I got a size L and they are amazing and I have room to grow! I possibly could’ve gotten away with a M but they feel so comfortable I’m not returning! The only issue is I wish they had pockets! Update****** The medium fits much better! That’s my usual size before pregnancy

These leggings are perfect maternity. The just could be a bit more supportive. I often found that I needed to pull them up as they give a lot of room for stretch. If you have a bump that needs support these might not be for you.

I bought these leggings around 9 weeks pregnant. I have photos in this review from 9 weeks, 20 weeks and now 23 weeks. So far these are my go to legging. I have 5 pairs of them, all in black. In the first trimester I folded the top part down and they acted like normal leggings with just a little more room for my slightly bigger belly. Now in the second trimester they work great with the full belly coverage. They remain up for the majority of the day, if I’m really running and moving around they slightly slide down but nothing that would warrant not buying them. The seams are sewn really well and I have had no problems with washing or drying many times. The thickness is enough where they are not see through but they are not winter thick. These leggings do not have pockets but this brand sells ones with pockets if you want those. Overall I wish I had these for my first pregnancy, but now that I have them I’m very happy with them (that’s why I bought 5 pairs) it’s totally worth the money. I bought size medium and I am pre pregnancy weight 150 and currently 158 at 23 weeks.
These are so comfy and perfect for maternity wear!
I have to pull these up a lot they run a bit big but bought two pair and I’ve lived in them for months now. Super thin but fine with me being hot and pregnant!

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Black Tie Dye Flowers
评论详情: The only pants I like to wear while pregnant. I bought 7 pairs. Material reminds me of lululemon without paying the price. Also love that my belly gets covered as my regular leggings would just roll down.

Self proclaimed shopaholic here! Hi! These are by far my favorite maternity leggings I bought! (And I bought a ton of different ones) The material is the perfect amount of thickness and not see through at all. They go over the bump perfectly and do not squeeze you one bit. The color does not fade in wash and cat hair doesn’t stick to them! Magic!! Most flattering pair of maternity leggings for the price! Love!

评论概述: Decent maternity legging for the price!
评论详情: Decent maternity legging compared to others I've ordered. The only thing I would caution you on is that the inside of the thigh(s) start to pill and wear after a few washes. They are also SUPER stretchy on the bump so better for 3rd trimester wear as opposed to 1st and 2nd!

This product was a life saver for my pregnancy. It is thin material so good for summer/ warmer weather, plenty of room for the belly. I am 5’4, 105 lb pre pregnancy- went up to 131 lb third trimester and it felt comfy around the belly without being large elsewhere. Got small size in two different colors and no regrets.

I looooooove these leggings! They honestly feel like Lululemon! I have several pairs of maternity leggings, but these top all of them. Very buttery smooth, very flattering, not see-through yet thin! I am 22 weeks along, 5’4 and about 163-166 lbs (depending on bloat/constipation lol). Before pregnancy I wore a size 8 or 10 typically (again depending on bloat because I have PCOS haha).  I never ever leave reviews but I had to today!

I like the comfort of these leggings but mine torn the first time I wore them around the seam in the waist. They weren’t too small, as I actually sized up since I will be growing, so I don’t think that was the issue.

These leggings are so good for pregnancy. I’m currently almost 17 weeks and bought them a few weeks ago. They’re extremely comfortable and stretchy. I can probably wear them throughout the entire pregnancy. I was recently gifted maternity leggings from another brand ($98), and they are not as good and extremely tight at the stomach. I’ll probably return and buy some more of the CRZ leggings

I bought these leggings during my first pregnancy, and they were game changers when it came to getting dressed in my 3rd trimester. They are really soft, warm, and not too thin. They are super flattering and not too tight on the bump. I wore them so often that I bought a second pair so I wouldn’t have to rewear dirty ones!

评论概述: Not What I Expected – Not Soft at All!
评论详情: I was really looking forward to trying the CRZ YOGA Women’s Butterluxe Maternity Leggings, expecting them to be as soft and comfy as advertised. But unfortunately, these leggings were nothing like the “buttery soft” promise. When I first put them on, I was disappointed to find that they felt more like stiff, rough fabric than anything resembling butter. For maternity leggings, I expected them to be cozy and gentle on my skin, especially during pregnancy when comfort is key—this was just not the case.  The fit itself wasn’t terrible, but the material was far from soft or luxurious. I kept thinking maybe I just got a defective pair, but after checking, it seems like this is the quality across the board.  For the price, these leggings were a letdown. I ended up returning them because there’s no way I’d want to spend all day in these uncomfortable, not-so-soft leggings.  1/5 stars, do not recommend. If you’re looking for buttery-soft leggings, keep looking! These are not it.
